name: Chemistry
degreeSubjectRequirements: Normally 50% of the degree should be relevant to the subject taught, if not an A level and SKE course may be required.
additionalGcseEquivalencies:
Details of how to obtain evidence of equivalency or sit equivalency tests may be found below:

[Equivalency Testing Brentwood](https://www.equivalencytesting.com/)

[A Star Equivalency Islington](https://astarequivalency.co.uk/)
aboutCourse: This will be a tuition course running between the host school and University of Sussex.
howSchoolPlacementsWork: There are two school placements. The main one at the host school until February half term, then the second school placement is 6 weeks at a partner school.
